version="28.1.2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="SeDHgtNA9wRoKnSuri2o"> <mxGraphModel dx="1896" dy="1167" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-21" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="175" y="-20" width="110" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-19" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="-10" width="90" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-13" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-20" y="-20" width="140" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-12" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;dashed=1;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="90" width="120" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-6" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;dashed=1;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-10" y="-10" width="120" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-1" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">登录shell</font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;">(会话组长)</font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-2" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">父进程</span><br><div><font style="font-size: 14px;">(进程组组长)</font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="100" width="100" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-3" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">子进程</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="200" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-4" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="50" y="50" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="50" y="100" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-9" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;strokeColor=default;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="50" y="150" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="50" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-10" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">fork()</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="55" y="165" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-14" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">fork()</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="55" y="65" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-15" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">exec()</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;align=right;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="65" width="50" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-16" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>a) 父进程和子进程的创建</b></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-30" y="260" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-17" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">进程</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" width="70" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-20" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">进程组</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="30" width="70" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-22" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">会话</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="60" width="70" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-23" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="120" width="120" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-24" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="190" y="130" width="100" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-25" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">init</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="140" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-28" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="-20" width="140" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-29" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;dashed=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="190" width="120" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-30" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;dashed=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="-10" width="120" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-31" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">登录shell</font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;">(会话组长)</font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" width="100" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-33" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">子进程</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="200" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-39" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="300" y="215" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="350" y="215" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-40" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">孤儿进程组</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="200" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-41" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;dashed=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="280" y="155" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-42" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">收养</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;rotation=20;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="156" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-44" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>b) 父进程退出后init收养子进程</b></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="260" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="URgFUBDGpH4nDUrY6vnM-45" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">孤儿进程组的创建步骤</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="115" y="300" width="220" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
